item.title: Investigating object orientation effects across 14 languages
item.description:
Video demonstration of the procedure followed in our lab

Reference

Chen, S., Szabelska, A., Chartier, C. R., Kekecs, Z., Lynott, D., Bernabeu, P., … Schmidt, K. (2018). Investigating object orientation effects across 14 languages. PsyArXiv. https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/t2pjv/

item.title: Dutch modality exclusivity norms for 336 properties and 411 concepts
item.description:
Reference
